ChildBranches.Name: Investigate the hold
ChildBranches.Description: What treasure did these villains take?

DefaultEvent.Description: An Unfinished Man is missing something that other Clay Men lack. What did each of these your enemies lack? An eye. A hand. Mercy. Obedience. Fear. Pain. A shadow. A sense of proportion. This may serve as material for philosophy, or for battle tactics.
DefaultEvent.Name: A hundred absences

ChildBranches.Name: Record any Observations
ChildBranches.Description: If you've gathered at least 10 Observations, you may learn something...

SuccessEvent.Description: When you next return to London, return to your Lodgings to claim your prize money...
SuccessEvent.Name: Awaiting your pleasure

DefaultEvent.Description: Your prize is never seen again. Perhaps a heptycheer devours your crew. Perhaps they devour each other. Perhaps they betray you and sail it to the Iron Republic, where laws cannot follow.
DefaultEvent.Name: Into the darkness

ChildBranches.Name: Send home with a prize crew
ChildBranches.Description: Four zailors should be enough for a skeleton crew, unless she runs into trouble.

Description: Fragments of clay are littered across the deck. They crunch underfoot like potsherds. Unfinished Men do not surrender.
Name: You've defeated the Unfinished Pirates
